HIV.IND.25.DEN

code: Denominator

description: Number of people assessed as being at elevated risk for HIV acquisition (includes people requesting/receiving any HIV prevention intervention, people from key populations, people with known risk factors or those assessed as being at risk of HIV acquisition) who received an HIV-negative test result in the reporting period.

-LanguageExpression
*text/cql-identifierDenominator

population

id

HIV.IND.25.NUM

code: Numerator

description: Number of individuals who tested HIV-negative assessed to be at elevated risk for HIV acquisition who had another HIV test within a defined period after previous test.

population.description: Number of people assessed as being at elevated risk for HIV acquisition (includes people requesting/receiving any HIV prevention intervention, people from key populations, people with known risk factors or those assessed as being at risk of HIV acquisition) who received an HIV-negative test result in the reporting period.
Number of individuals who tested HIV-negative assessed to be at elevated risk for HIV acquisition who had another HIV test within a defined period after previous test.
